author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tiruvalluvar statue unveiled

A statue of Tamil saint-poet Tiruvalluvar was unveiled at the Government Higher Secondary School, Chinniampalayam on Friday. A release said that Siravai Aadheenam (Koumara Madalayam) Kumara Gurubara Swami unveiled the statue in the presence of Panchayat president Devarajan.

Those who had donated money for the statue and members of the public were also present.

Appointed

Dr. S. Raja Sabapathy, chairman, Hand and Reconstructive Microsurgery and Burns, Ganga Hospital, has been appointed for a second term as honorary consultant and advisor to the Indian Armed Forces and Medical Services for three years. He was also a member of the Armed Forces Medical Research Committee of the Defence Research and Development Organisation for three years.

Passport adalat

An exclusive adalat for Hajj pilgrims will be held at the Regional Passport Office here on January 22. Those in Coimbatore, Salem, Erode, Namakkal, Tirupur, and the Nilgiris can attend. Phone: 0422-2301415 email id: rpo.cbe@mea.gov.in

Toll free number

The police have started a toll free telephone number (10581) to gather information on sale, and production of illicit liquor and duplicate brands of Indian Made Foreign liquor.

A press release here has said that the informers' names would be kept a secret.
